section.p: Celebrate your Oakland Raiders fandom with this Marcel Reece Limited jersey by Nike! Add to your collection of team gear and clearly show off your Oakland Raiders pride in a brand new way with this Nike Limited jersey. It features a realistic design with quality embroidered Raiders graphics and printed lettering that will get you ready for game day as soon as you throw it on!

ul.li: Stitched tackle twill name and numbers
Mesh side panels for extra breathability
